          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Die pH Skala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'échelle de pH</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the pH scale for determining the strength of an acid or an alkali.</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'échelle de pH pour

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a escala do pH para

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la scala di pH per la
